resources.string: Are you sure you want delete this devices?
Are you sure you want delete ALL devices?

Check Bluetooth will check and keep information about your Bluetooth devices in a database.


You get information about bluetooth devices that your Smartphone has scanned.


Check Bluetooth inform you about:


❶ Name of the device.


❷ MAC Address.


❸ Power Level Received signal strength indication (rssi).


❹ You also get information about paired devices.


❺ You get information about the Company or Manufacturer of the scanned device based on the scanned MAC address. Retrieved from https://macvendors.com.
